original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Kalahari
overview: The Kalahari is a unique habitat in Southern Africa a world full of austere beauty and fascinating inhabitants. Only a few marks in the sand indicate the presence of Man. The Kalahari is often mistakenly described as a desert as in this region in the heart of Botswana it is more like an arid savannah & most visitors are surprised by the exceptionally large biodiversity of the local flora and fauna
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Kalahari
